text: Marion Correctional Institution is a state prison for men in Ocala, Marion County, Florida, owned and operated by the Florida Department of Corrections. The facility houses a maximum of 1324 inmates at a mix of security levels. It stands near to Florida's Florida Women's Reception Center and Lowell Correctional Institution, both women's facilities. ==References== Category:Prisons in Florida Category:Buildings and structures in Marion County, Florida Category:1976 establishments in Florida
title: Marion Correctional Institution (Florida)
